Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL EMPLOYEES

Title: Relates to granting retroactive tier IV membership in the NY state and local employees' retirement system for Rebecca Leonard
Summary: Relates to granting retroactive tier IV membership in the NY state and local employees' retirement system for Rebecca Leonard.
ActClause: AN ACT granting retroactive tier IV membership in the New York state and local employees' retirement system to Rebecca Leonard
